拙.definition: awkward; clumsy; dull; inelegant; (polite) my; Taiwan pr. [zhuo2]

拙作.definition: my unworthy manuscript (humble expr.); my humble writing

拙嘴笨舌.definition: lit. clumsy mouth and broken tongue (idiom); awkward speaker

拙政園.definition: Humble Administrator's Garden in Suzhou, Jiangsu

拙於言詞.definition: to be unable to express oneself clearly (idiom)

拙稿.definition: my unworthy manuscript (humble expr.); my humble writing

拙筆.definition: my clumsy writing (humble expr.); my humble pen

拙著.definition: my unworthy writing (humble expr.); my worthless manuscript
